# @unite-us/ui

##  Installation & Usage
1. run `npm install`
1. run `npm run styleguide` and visit [http://localhost:6060](http://http://localhost:6060)

## Copy a build
If you want to copy a build to app-client or another app, run `npm build:copy`. Your clone of this repo must be at the same directory level as the target app.

## Tests
1. run `npm test`

## Releases
Please refer to this repo's [README](/README.md) for instructions on versioning and publishing releases.

Something new, after 2.0.10
